resources.string:
How to Connect to the ToolCase:
1. Make sure your device\'s Wi-fi is on.
2. Makes sure that the case is switched on and has batteries in it.
3. Open your Wi-fi menu to select the "ToolCase" Wi-fi network and enter the password.
4. Wait for the status inside the app to say "Connected to ToolCase".
If you encounter issues, restart your device and try again.

TroubleShooting

Wi-fi network "ToolCase" does not appear:
If the "ToolCase" Network does not appear in your wifi fie network here are a couple things you may want to try:
1. Try turning the ToolCase off and on again.
2. Replace the batteries in the ToolCase.
3. Restart your phone.
